channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: 3 Super Useful Linux Apps to Try This Weekend (September 12 - 14)
item.dc:creator: Jordan Gloor
item.description: One of these apps is on the "different" side.
item.content:encoded: It isn't easy to figure out which of the sundry Linux software out there is worth installing. I've been assessing my own workflows, scanning repositories. and looking up use-cases, and I found three I think you ought to check out.

item.title: Peaky Blinders Movie: The Immortal Man—What You Need to Know
item.dc:creator: Keeley Brooks
item.description: The Peaky Blinders saga continues with the highly anticipated movie, The Immortal Man. Get the scoop on the plot, cast, and release date.
item.content:encoded: Bust out your best flat caps and leather jackets, because the Peaky Blinders are back, baby ... well, almost. After six insanely successful seasons, the epic Netflix Original gangster saga from creator Steven Knight is set to wrap up its story of the Shelby clan with a highly anticipated movie.

item.title: HBO Max Lead Thinks You're Paying Too Little
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.content:encoded: Our streaming services have gotten a lot more expensive over the past two years—what used to be $10 at most is now easily up to $20 a month. HBO Max's lead thinks you're paying too little, despite the frequent price hikes.

item.title: Retro '90s Techno Thrillers That Predicted Our Digital Future
item.dc:creator: Mark McPherson
item.description: From virtual reality to hacking, these 10 retro classics pushed the boundaries of technology and suspense.
item.content:encoded: The 1990s were a wild time for technology. The internet was taking off with AOL’s popularity, computer-animated media was becoming more common, and Windows 95 changed how we viewed operating systems forever. As our technology changed, so did films that utilized everything from computers to virtual reality.

item.title: iPhone Air vs. Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Which Ultra-Thin Flagship Should You Pick?
item.dc:creator: Shikhar Mehrotra
item.description: You'll have to choose between better battery life or a versatile camera system.
item.content:encoded: The iPhone Air is Apple's first ultra-thin flagship, and second in the category after Samsung's S25 Edge. While Apple's slimmest iPhone includes a ProMotion screen, a 48MP rear-facing camera, and a USB-C port, it also has several downsides. But how does it compare to the S25 Edge? Let's find out.

item.title: Plugable PS-6CC Charging Station Review: The Perfect Travel Companion
item.dc:creator: Kris Henges
item.description: The Plugable PS-6CC is compact and charges your devices efficiently.
item.content:encoded: We use so many devices nowadays—and as such, we need to charge them all, too. The Plugable PS-6CC Charging Station is up to the task of charging all of your gear, and it's the perfect travel companion.

item.title: 3 HBO Max Shows to Devour This Weekend (September 12 - 14)
item.dc:creator: Derek Malcolm
item.description: 3 HBO Max shows you can get through in a single weekend binge.
item.content:encoded: A good friend of mine back in the day had HBO, and hanging out at his house every Sunday watching The Sopranos was one of the highlights of the week. I was raised on tame network television, so HBO completely blew my mind. Happily, HBO Max is still exploding my cranium with its vast library of award-winning shows.

item.title: 3 Prime Video Shows You Should Watch This Weekend (September 12 - 14)
item.dc:creator: Joe Keeley
item.description: Send your week out on a high with these fantastic TV shows.
item.content:encoded: Can you ever watch too much TV? Definitely not. But deciding what to watch? That's the trickier part. It's easy to waste valuable viewing time scrolling through the algorithm's recommendations, with nothing standing out as worthwhile.

item.title: 3 Netflix Shows You Need to Binge This Weekend (September 12 - 14)
item.dc:creator: Joe Keeley
item.description: These Netflix shows will keep you glued to your screen.
item.content:encoded: Those weekend chores can wait a while longer—now is the time for relaxing and fun. To that end, I've rounded up three Netflix shows that received acclaim from both audiences and critics, and all are perfect entertainment for the next few days.

item.title: Torn Between the iPhone 17 and 17 Pro? Here's How to Choose
item.dc:creator: Shikhar Mehrotra
item.description: Choosing between the base and Pro iPhone has never been this difficult.
item.content:encoded: It's that time of the year again: Apple has dropped four new iPhones, and like the millions of buyers around the world, I'm wondering whether I should upgrade to the iPhone 17 or the iPhone 17 Pro. Apple has made it really difficult to choose between the two this year, as the baseline iPhone is no longer an entry-level compromise.
